query.formula: A[] forall(i:CB_id) (not(CB(i).Initial) && not(CB(i).Switching) && boxes[i] != -1) imply (Point(boxes[i]).Plus && CB(i).connected == CBs[i][1]) || (Point(boxes[i]).Minus && CB(i).connected == CBs[i][2])
query.comment: The local state information about connected segments of a switch box is consistent with the actual state of the switch.

query.formula: A[] forall(i:t_id) (TCC(i).CrossingPoint imply (CB(TCC(i).nextSB).connected == TCC(i).curSeg.id && CB(TCC(i).nextSB).stem == TCC(i).nextSeg.id) || (CB(TCC(i).nextSB).stem == TCC(i).curSeg.id && CB(TCC(i).nextSB).connected == TCC(i).nextSeg.id))
query.comment: A train can only cross a point if the point's position is consistent with the segment that the trains is entering.

query.formula: A[] forall(i:t_id) (TCC(i).CrossingPoint imply boxes[TCC(i).nextSB] == -1 || Point(boxes[TCC(i).nextSB]).Plus || Point(boxes[TCC(i).nextSB]).Minus)

A[] forall(i:t_id) (not(TCC(i).Initial) && TCC(i).nextSeg.cbs[0] != TCC(i).nextSeg.cbs[1]) imply ( TCC(i).curSeg.cbs[1] == TCC(i).nextSeg.cbs[0] || TCC(i).curSeg.cbs[0] == TCC(i).nextSeg.cbs[1] || TCC(i).curSeg == TCC(i).nextSeg)
query.comment: A train's current segment is either the same as its next segment or connected to it.
All trains will eventually arrive at their destinations.

query.formula: A[] forall(i:t_id) forall(j:t_id) i != j and not(TCC(i).Initial) and not(TCC(j).Initial) imply TCC(i).curSeg != TCC(j).curSeg
query.comment: Two trains are never on the same segment after the initialization step.
